content:
NotifyCollectionChangedEventHandler Delegate

Definition

Represents the method that handles the CollectionChanged event.

In this Article

[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TypeForwardedFrom("WindowsBase, Version=3.0.0.0, Culture=Neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35")]
public delegate void NotifyCollectionChangedEventHandler(object sender, NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs e);
Inheritance
Object
System.Delegate
NotifyCollectionChangedEventHandler
